transport.question: I go beep beep! What am I?
I chug along the tracks, choo choo! What am I?
I float on the water. Toot toot! What am I?
I have two wheels and you can ride me with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can put a basket on me.
🛣️ I can go on the road or a path.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky. Whoosh! What am I?
I am big and yellow and take lots of children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have a stop sign that comes out.
🧑‍🏫 I drop you off at the school door.
🚦I always stop at the train tracks.

transport.question: I have a siren and help people who are sick or hurt. What am I?

hints.text: 🏥 I take people to the hospital.

transport.question: I help put out fires and have a big ladder. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I help when something is burning.

transport.question: I go underground and carry lots of people in a city. What am I?

hints.text: 🗺️ I stop at different stations in a city.

transport.question: I lift heavy things at a construction site. What am I?

hints.text: 🪨 I can lift big rocks and beams.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Sometimes cows eat me. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I grow outside in a field.
💚 I am the color of many trees.

additionalData.fact: Grass is food for many animals

plant.question: I am big and tall and have leaves. Birds like to sit in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I can be very, very big!
🍂 I lose my leaves in the fall.

additionalData.fact: Trees give us oxygen to breathe

plant.question: I am red and round and grow on a plant. You can eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am often used to make sauce!
🥗 I can be eaten in a salad.

plant.question: I am yellow and grow on a stalk. You can eat me off the cob. What am I?

hints.text: 👂 You can eat me with your hands
🌽 Birds and squirrels like to eat me too!

additionalData.fact: Corn is a type of grain.

plant.question: I am a flower that is yellow and turns its head to follow the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ My name tells you what I love to follow.
🐦 Birds like to eat my seeds.

additionalData.fact: Sunflower seeds are a healthy snack.

plant.question: I have a trunk and branches, and I make something sweet that bees love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I have pretty blossoms in the spring.
🍎 You can pick fruit from me.

additionalData.fact: Fruit trees need care to produce good fruit.

plant.question: I am long and orange and grow under the ground. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 👀 I am good for your eyesight.

additionalData.fact: Carrots are a good source of Vitamin A.

plant.question: I'm a plant that can be spicy or sweet. Sometimes I'm red, green, or yellow, and I grow in a garden. What am I?

hints.text: 🌶️ I can make your mouth feel hot!
🟢 You can eat me raw or cooked.

additionalData.fact: Some peppers are hotter than others!

plant.question: I grow on a vine and am green or purple. You can eat me or make juice from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 You can find me in bunches.
🥤 I am a popular flavor for juice.
☀️ I need a lot of sun to grow.

additionalData.fact: Grapes can be made into raisins.

plant.question: I'm a flower with a long stem and thorns, often given as a gift. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am a symbol of love.
🔪 Be careful of my sharp parts.

additionalData.fact: Roses come in many different colors.
